issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

fields.description: See the changes in [https://github.com/conda-forge/arrow-cpp-feedstock/pull/123], we need to copy this into the Arrow repository and also test CUDA in these recipes.
fields.summary: [C++/Python] Enable CUDA Support in conda recipes

comments.body: [~uwe] what is the status of it? I assume we can postpone it.
Yes, PRs are open but there is still discussion.
The conda-forge PR has merged. Should we pick this up now? [~uwe] can you take this on?
